00077           public function __destruct(){
00078                     if($this->errstring!=''){
00079                               doLog($this->errstring);
00080                     }
00081                     $this->saveCache();
00082           }
00083           
00092           function doAdminSoap($soap,$showerrorsonly=0){
00093                     //$username,$password,$action,$soap,$parse=false
00094                     $config=array();
00095                     $ret=$this->zimbraSoap->doadmin(zimbraConfig::adminAccount_user,zimbraConfig::adminAccount_password,$soap[0],$soap[1],$config);
00096                     
00097                     if($showerrorsonly){
00098                               return (isset($ret['soap:Body']['soap:Fault']['soap:faultstring']))?$ret['soap:Body']['soap:Fault']['soap:faultstring']:'';
00099                     }
00100                     
00101                     return $ret;
00102           }
00103

00116                     //$username,$action,$urn,$soap,$parse=false
00117                     $config=array('donnotaskey'=>!$naskey);
00118                     $ret=$this->zimbraSoap->douser($user,$soap[0],$soap[1],$soap[2],$config);

00120                     
00121                     return $ret;

00141           // Cacheing;
00153           function setCache($cachegroup, $key, $val,$unset=false){
00154                     if(!$this->cache)$this->initCache();
00155                     if($unset){
00156                               //unset($this->cache[$cachegroup][$key]);
00157                               $this->cache[$cachegroup][$key]=NULL; //??
00158                     }else{
00159                               $this->cache[$cachegroup][$key]=$val;
00160                     }
00161           }
00162           
00171           function getCache($cachegroup, $key){
00172                     if(!$this->cache)$this->initCache();
00173                     
00174                     if(isset($this->cache[$cachegroup][$key])){
00175                               return $this->cache[$cachegroup][$key];
00176                     }
00177                     
00178                     return false;
00179           }
00180           
00181           
00188           function initCache(){
00189                     $ret='';
00190                     try{
00191                               $ret=@unserialize(@file_get_contents($this->path.'cache_GETAPI.txt'));
00192                     }catch(Exception $e){
00193                               $this->cache=array();
00194                     }
00195                     $this->cache=$ret;
00196           }
00197           
00204           function saveCache(){
00205                     if(is_array($this->cache)&&count($this->cache)>0){
00206                               file_put_contents($this->path.'cache_GETAPI.txt',serialize($this->cache));
00207                     }
00208           }
00209

00219           }
